The default config in node software is to enable listening. However, the problem tends to be that most folks run nodes behind routers and don't configure the routers to forward incoming traffic correctly, thus they end up being non-listening. https:// bitcoin.org/en/full-node#n etwork-configuration …

If there are 10K listening Bitcoin nodes & 100K non-listening nodes online then there are ~280K sockets available. SPV clients use 4 sockets, meaning ~70K clients can be connected simultaneously. Want to support more SPV clients? Need more listening nodes online. #FullNodesMatter
